author: TPH

game.author: Mantar
game.name: exile
game.short_description: Challenging, at times brutal, wilderness survival with simple technology.
game.title: Exile

long_description:
I do plan to add more things - maybe like snowmen or other snowy crafts - but as it stands - you can throw snowballs at eachother for as long as your heart desires!!!

Snowballs have particles when they land and they can blind your opponents if you hit 'em right on the head or face! Throwing + hit sounds too. Have to charge up those snowballs as well! x3

Will send messages about players being hit in the face - hopefully funny! :D

Pretty rudimentary, likely to change a lot of this up in the future - but for now - enjoyyyy
name: exile_snow
title: Exile Snow Fun
